title: Forsaken Yasuo and Arclight Zed
body:
just thought it would be cool to see a skin like that.
Yasuo Could look like Darth Sidious.

replies.body: i love this idea. Yasuo's background story perfectly fits with the idea of "Forsaken". Looks so much better with Black/Red theme on him than PROJECT: Yasuo. Just my opinion.
those wold literally be the worst skins in the game

firstly guess u havent seen any urgot skin or rusty blitzcrank and second, just because you don't like it doesnt mean it'd be bad. The guy just made and idea he doesn't need to hear your useless opinion

it was just an idea I came up with.
just because you don't like it doesn't mean you have to be mean and say they are the worst skins ever.
:(
